Children.ScriptAction:
SetLocation("Town, Watchtower")
SetInventoryEnabled(true)
AddLink(Compass.NORTH, "Scene_TownMarket")
--AddLink(Compass.EAST, "Scene_CropFields")
AddLink(Compass.SOUTH, function()
    -- player can pass if MQ01 was completed
    if Storage.GetFlag("mq01_done") then
        SetScene("Scene_RoadNorth")
    else
        Log("town_gate_mq01lock")
    end
end)

--if not Storage.GetFlag("town_gate_first") then

    Log("town_gate_first")
--end
Log("town_gate")
